review: Love it! Hopefully we'll get more companies supporting it soon but for now it's great to stream Netflix and youtube!
author: Oliver Acevedo

review: Received it Friday.  Plugged it into the TV, configured it for my network and started streaming YouTube and Netflix.  Watched about 4 hours Friday night and several more over the weekend.  It does what it's supposed to do and what Google says it will do.  I'm hoping there will be more services getting on board with the Chromecast.  I'll order 2 more for the rest of the TVs in my house.
author: Robert J Schulz

review: I could stream YouTube flawlessly to my non-smart TV and also use the Chrome browser to stream other types of media.There is a lot of potential for this product; looking forward to future support for other apps.

review: The Google Chromecast was easy to setup. In just a few simple steps I had it working with no issue. You need to use an Android device or PC to set it up after that you can use Netflix on your IPAD. It works great.

review: Have been using it for a week and an awesome product for the price. Worked seamlessly from my PC and for Netflix/YouTube. Waiting for the iOS app.
